mapper.select: SELECT voicecommand.id,voicecommand.vcommand, systemcommand.`value`,voicecommand.mem,voicecommand.data from voicecommand LEFT JOIN systemcommand ON systemcommand.id=voicecommand.sid WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT voicecommand.id,voicecommand.vcommand, systemcommand.`value` as scommand,voicecommand.mem,voicecommand.data from voicecommand LEFT JOIN systemcommand ON systemcommand.id=voicecommand.sid

SELECT voicecommand.id,voicecommand.vcommand, systemcommand.`value` as scommand,voicecommand.mem,voicecommand.data from voicecommand LEFT JOIN systemcommand ON systemcommand.id=voicecommand.sid WHERE voicecommand.vcommand = #{vcommand,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into voicecommand (id, vcommand, sid, mem) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{vcommand,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into voicecommand
id,
vcommand,
sid,
mem,
data,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{vcommand,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{sid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update voicecommand
vcommand = #{vcommand,jdbcType=CHAR},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=CHAR},
mem = #{mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
